sourcesContent:
<template>
    <l-map
      ref="map"
      v-bind:max-zoom="19"
      v-bind:zoomAnimation="true"
      v-bind:markerZoomAnimation="true"
      v-bind:zoom="zoom"
      v-bind:center="{ lat: 51.289404225298256, lng: 9.697202050919614 }"
      v-on:ready="onLeafletReady"
    >
      <template v-if="leafletReady">
        <l-tile-layer :url="url" />
        <marker-cluster
          :options="{
            removeOutsideVisibleBounds: true,
            chunkedLoading: true,
          }"
          @ready="onMarkerClusterReady"
        />
      </template>
    </l-map>
  </template>
  <script>
  import "leaflet/dist/leaflet.css";
  
  import {
    LMap,
    LMarker,
    LTileLayer,
    LPopup,
  } from "@vue-leaflet/vue-leaflet/src/lib";
  import MarkerCluster from "./MarkerCluster.vue";
  
  export default {
    components: {
      LMap,
      LTileLayer,
      LMarker,
      MarkerCluster,
      LPopup,
    },
  
    data() {
      return {
        url: "https://{s}.tile.osm.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png",
        zoom: 1,
        markers: [],
  
        leafletReady: false,
        leafletObject: null,
  
        visible: false,
      };
    },
  
    methods: {
      async onMarkerClusterReady(markerCluster) {
        const L = await import("leaflet/dist/leaflet-src.esm");
  
        await this.$nextTick();
  
        function r(min, max) {
          return Math.random() * (max - min) + min;
        }
        let markers = [];
        for (let i = 0; i < 50000; i++) {
          const title = `marker ${i}`;
          const marker = L.marker(
            L.latLng(r(53.82477192, 53.92365592), r(27.5078027, 27.70640622)),
            { title: title }
          );
          marker.bindPopup(title);
          markers.push(marker);
        }
  
        markerCluster.addLayers(markers);
      },
  
      async onLeafletReady() {
        this.leafletObject = this.$refs.map.leafletObject;
        this.leafletReady = true;
      },
    },
  };
  </script>
